name: ProcessFlowZoomLevel
docu: The zoom level defines level of details for the node and how much space the process flow requires.

docu.name: One
docu.value: zoom level for least details - only icon is displayed

docu.name: Two
docu.value: The detail is icon, title text and no additional texts

docu.name: Three
docu.value: The full detail view of the node but with smaller font size

docu.name: Four
docu.value: The full details with normal font size
